DOC.brief_summary: The purpose of this study was to investigate the effect of Thai massage on pressure pain threshold, pain intensity, wrist range of motion, grip strength and patient satisfaction in patients with wrist extensor muscles latent Myofascial trigger points.
DOC.brief_title: Effects of Thai Massage on Patients With Wrist Extensor Muscles Latent Myofascial Trigger Points
DOC.criteria: Male or female Age between 18 40 years old The participants have at least one latent trigger point in the wrist extensor groups muscles. The participants will be able to follow instructions. Good communication and cooperation. Contraindications of traditional Thai massage Tennis elbow or Golf's elbow Poor skin sentation
